vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.19.37;
son of: Sennacherib (H5576);
brother of: Adrammelech (H0152H) and Esarhaddon (H0634)
§ Sharezer or Sherezer = "prince of fire"
1) son of king Sennacherib of Assyria and murderer of his father
2) an Israelite whom the people sent to the house of God to pray in the time of the prophet Zechariah and king Darius
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Senaquerib, rey de Asiria; (b)   hombre; de Betel; en tiempos del profeta Zacarías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙利色 或 沙利亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 「烈火之君」
1) 亞述王西拿基立的兒子, 後來弒父 ( 王下 19:36-37)
2) 大利烏王年間, 先知撒迦利亞時代的以色列人,
百姓打發他到神的殿禱告求問神 ( 亞 7:1-3)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
沙利色 或 沙利亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 「烈火之君」
1) 亚述王西拿基立的儿子, 后来弒父 ( 王下 19:36-37)
2) 大利乌王年间, 先知撒迦利亚时代的以色列人,
百姓打发他到神的殿祷告求问神 ( 亚 7:1-3)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Zec.7.2
§ Sharezer or Sherezer = "prince of fire"
1) son of king Sennacherib of Assyria and murderer of his father
2) an Israelite whom the people sent to the house of God to pray in the time of the prophet Zechariah and king Darius
